content.question: Which of the following best describes the authorâ€™s exigence in the passage?

choices.label: The lack of interest among eligible voters in the political process
The limited resources available to women for changing existing power structures
Widening disparities in the socioeconomic circumstances of American and British women
Public resentment of the high tax rate imposed by the government

content.answer: The limited resources available to women for changing existing power structures

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
